explains: v. （使）打旋，（使）旋动；流传（尤用于新闻报道）；眩晕
n. 打旋，旋涡；漩涡状，螺旋形；纷乱
wordGroup: swirl chamber 涡流室，涡流式燃烧室；涡良烧室

sentences.en: Long vines swirl round the tree.
sentences.cn: 长长的藤葛盘绕在树身上。

sentences.en: The reason for this swirl of maritime outlawry can be found on the nearest shore.
sentences.cn: 造成这种海上流亡者漩涡的原因可以在最近的岸上找到。

sentences.en: If he/she goes into a negative swirl, ignore or give a simple "I see' or 'OK" reply.
sentences.cn: 如果他/她陷入了消极的漩涡中，忽略或者用简单的“我明白了”或“好”来答复。
